src:
東急田園都市線、一時運転見合わせ

02 Nov 2019, 09:00

　東急田園都市線は、渋谷駅での車両点検のため、２日午後５時２１分頃から渋谷―用賀駅間の上下線で運転を見合わせていたが、午後６時０分から運転を再開した。
text:
Tokyu Denentoshi Line, temporary stoppage

02 Nov 2019, 09:00

The Tokyu Denentoshi Line had been scheduled to stop driving on the upper and lower lines between Shibuya and Yoga Station at around 5:21 pm on the 2nd due to vehicle inspection at Shibuya Station, but resumed operation at 6:00 pm.
